pages.text: Qalu Ya Musa 'Imma 'An Tulqiya Wa 'Imma 'An Nakuna 'Awwala Man 'Alqa
Qala Bal 'Alqu Fa'idha Hibaluhum Wa `Isiyuhum Yukhayyalu 'Ilayhi Min Sihrihim 'Annaha Tas`a
Wa 'Alqi Ma Fi Yaminika Talqaf Ma Sana`u 'Innama Sana`u Kaydu Sahirin Wa La Yuflihu As-Sahiru Haythu 'Ata
Fa'ulqiya As-Saharatu Sujjadaan Qalu 'Amanna Birabbi Haruna Wa Musa

Qala 'Amantum Lahu Qabla 'An 'Adhana Lakum 'Innahu Lakabirukumu Al-Ladhi `Allamakumu As-Sihra Fala'uqatti`anna 'Aydiyakum Wa 'Arjulakum Min Khilafin Wa La'usallibannakum Fi Judhu`i An-Nakhli Wa Lata`lamunna 'Ayyuna 'Ashaddu `Adhabaan Wa 'Abqa
Qalu Lan Nu'uthiraka `Ala Ma Ja'ana Mina Al-Bayyinati Wa Al-Ladhi Fatarana Faqđi Ma 'Anta Qađin 'Innama Taqđi Hadhihi Al-Hayaata Ad-Dunya
Inna 'Amanna Birabbina Liyaghfira Lana Khatayana Wa Ma 'Akrahtana `Alayhi Mina As-Sihri Wa Allahu Khayrun Wa 'Abqa
Innahu Man Ya'ti Rabbahu Mujrimaan Fa'inna Lahu Jahannama La Yamutu Fiha Wa La Yahya
Wa Man Ya'tihi Mu'uminaan Qad `Amila As-Salihati Fa'ula'ika Lahumu Ad-Darajatu Al-`Ula
Jannatu `Adnin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Khalidina Fiha Wa Dhalika Jaza'u Man Tazakka
